First Graders Spotted Celebrating the 101st Day of School
First graders at Sylvan Avenue Elementary School recently celebrated their 101st day of the school year in a pawsitively wonderful way. On Feb. 25, the students dressed up as the... (more) First Graders Spotted Celebrating the 101st Day of School Slideshow Caption

img.title: Kindness Connects Sylvan Avenue Elementary
